history.proof: intros pl0 pl1 n plp H1 H2 H3. exists pl_path_nil, pl_path_nil. split; [|split]; auto. - shelve. - shelve. - shelve.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit pl0 pl1) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1

Premises:
pl_path_product = fix pl_path_product (p0 p1 : pl_path) {struct p1} : pl_path := match p0 with | pl_path_nil => match p1 with | pl_path_nil | _ => pl_path_nil end | pl_path_cons a0 b0 => match p1 with | pl_path_nil => pl_path_nil | pl_path_cons a1 b1 => pl_path_cons (iad_conv a0 a1) (pl_path_product b0 b1) end end : pl_path -> pl_path -> pl_path
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat For S: Argument scope is [nat_scope]
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
pl_produit = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_produit_1 pl0 (pl_essence pl0 pl1) pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list
Inductive pl_tl_length : prec_list -> nat -> Prop := pl_tl_O : pl_tl_length prec_empty 0 | pl_tl_S : forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n) | pl_tl_propag : forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> pl_tl_length (prec_cons a la ls) (S n) For pl_tl_length: Argument scopes are [_ nat_scope] For pl_tl_S: Argument scopes are [_ _ nat_scope _] For pl_tl_propag: Argument scopes are [_ _ _ nat_scope _ _]
Inductive pl_path : Set := pl_path_nil : pl_path | pl_path_cons : ad -> pl_path -> pl_path
pl_produit_path_incl_3 : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n m : nat) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1
pl_produit_path_incl_def_3 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_produit_path_incl_2 : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit pl0 pl1)
pl_produit_path_incl_def_2 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> (exists plp0 plp1 : pl_path, plp = pl_path_product plp0 plp1 /\ pl_path_incl plp0 (prec_cons a pl0 prec_empty) /\ pl_path_incl plp1 pl1) \/ pl_path_incl plp l : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_produit_path_incl_1 : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1)
pl_produit_path_incl_def_1 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp0 pl0 -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_produit_path_incl_def_0 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (n m : nat) (plp0 plp1 : pl_path) (a : ad) (l : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp0 (prec_cons a pl0 prec_empty) -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_path_incl plp1 pl1 -> pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_product plp0 plp1) (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_tl_length_prod : forall (pl0 pl1 : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit pl0 pl1) n
pl_produit_path_incl_inj : forall (plp0 plp1 plp2 plp3 : pl_path) (n : nat), pl_path_length plp0 = n -> pl_path_length plp1 = n -> pl_path_length plp2 = n -> pl_path_length plp3 = n -> pl_path_product plp0 plp1 = pl_path_product plp2 plp3 -> plp0 = plp2 /\ plp1 = plp3
pl_compatible = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => exists n : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n /\ pl_tl_length pl1 n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_tl_length_prod_def_1 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall n m : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length pl1 n -> pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_1 pl0 m pl1) n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_tl_length_prod_def_0 = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => forall (l : prec_list) (a : ad) (n m : nat), pl_essence pl0 pl1 <= m -> pl_tl_length pl0 n -> pl_tl_length l (S n) \/ l = prec_empty -> (pl_tl_length pl1 (S n) -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) (S n)) /\ (pl1 = prec_empty -> (pl_tl_length l (S n) -> pl_tl_length (pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l) (S n)) /\ (l = prec_empty -> pl_produit_0 a pl0 pl1 m l = prec_empty)) : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
pl_produit_path_incl_0 : forall (n : nat) (a : ad) (la pl l : prec_list) (plp : pl_path), pl_path_incl plp l -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_essence la pl <= n -> pl_path_incl plp (pl_produit_0 a la pl n l)
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_path_incl_length : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n
pl_path_rec_equiv_0 : forall (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list), liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp
prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
pl_compat_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compat pl0 pl1 -> pl_compat pl1 pl0
pl_compatible_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compatible pl0 pl1 -> pl_compatible pl1 pl0
pl_path_rec_equiv_0_def = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) => liste_reconnait d pl tl -> exists plp : pl_path, pl_path_incl plp pl /\ pl_path_recon d tl plp : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop
pl_path_incl_length_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => forall n : nat, pl_path_incl plp pl -> pl_tl_length pl n -> pl_path_length plp = n : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
pl_path_rec_equiv_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def = fun (plp : pl_path) (pl : prec_list) => pl_path_incl plp pl -> forall (d : preDTA) (tl : term_list) (n : nat), pl_path_recon d tl plp -> pl_tl_length pl n -> liste_reconnait d pl tl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop
Inductive pl_path_incl : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop := pl_path_incl_nil : pl_path_incl pl_path_nil prec_empty | pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls) | pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a
pl_essence = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl_card pl0 + pl_card pl1 : prec_list -> prec_list -> nat
pl_path_incl_next : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl plp (prec_cons a la ls)
forall_incl_length : forall (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), (forall p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl -> pl_path_length p = n) -> pl_tl_length pl n
pl_path_incl_ind : forall P : pl_path -> prec_list -> Prop, P pl_path_nil prec_empty -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> P plp la -> P (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)) -> (forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> P plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> P plp (prec_cons a la ls)) -> forall (p : pl_path) (p0 : prec_list), pl_path_incl p p0 -> P p p0
pl_ess_invar_0 : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, 1 <= pl_essence pl0 pl1
pl_ess_invar_5 : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, 2 <= pl_essence pl0 pl1
non_empty_pl_path_exists : forall pl : prec_list, pl <> prec_empty -> exists p : pl_path, pl_path_incl p pl /\ 1 <= pl_path_length p
pl_path_incl_length_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_2 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp ls -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp ls -> plp <> pl_path_nil -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_cons : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_rec_equiv_1_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def plp la -> pl_path_rec_equiv_1_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)
pl_path_incl_length_1 : forall (plp : pl_path) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl_path_incl plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def plp la -> pl_path_incl_length_def (pl_path_cons a plp) (prec_cons a la ls)

```intros pl0 pl1 n plp H1 H2 H3.
exists pl_path_nil, pl_path_nil.
split; [|split]; auto.
